meanings.definition: Capable of holding much; spacious or roomy.
meanings.sent1: The warehouse had a capacious storage area for all the boxes.
meanings.sent2: The backpack was so capacious that it could fit all my books and snacks.
meanings.sent3: The capacious picnic basket held enough food for a whole day at the park.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like a capacious vessel, overflowing with love for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The capacious auditorium echoed with the sound of laughter and music.

meanings.definition: Able to contain or hold much; roomy.
meanings.sent1: The capacious closet had enough space for all her clothes and shoes.
meanings.sent2: The car's capacious trunk could fit all the camping gear for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The capacious purse seemed to magically hold more items than expected.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a capacious library, storing memories of a lifetime.
meanings.sent5: The capacious garden welcomed a variety of colorful flowers and plants.
